drug.name: Salvianolic acid A
drug.description: Salvianolic acid A is under investigation in clinical trial NCT03908242 (Phase I Study of Continuous Administration of Salvianolic Acid A Tablet).

article.citation: Murakami S, Kijima H, Isobe Y, Muramatsu M, Aihara H, Otomo S, Li LN, Ai CB: Effect of salvianolic acid A, a depside from roots of Salvia miltiorrhiza, on gastric H+,K(+)-ATPase. Planta Med. 1990 Aug;56(4):360-3. doi: 10.1055/s-2006-960982.

drug-interaction.name: Bosutinib
drug-interaction.description: Salvianolic acid A can cause a decrease in the absorption of Bosutinib resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Cefditoren
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Cefditoren can be decreased when it is combined with Salvianolic acid A.
